hymn.title: The Seatbelt Song
hymn.category: Principles on How to Be a Proper Human Being—General

layout.singingstanza: I love you— and you love me— So we are go -- ing to buck -- le our seats. We're going to make ver -- y sure That we're safe and se -- cure; Be -- cause I love you and you love me.
